title: Call of Juarez®: Bound in Blood
notes:
Screen resolution auto-detection is broken on first launch, so you need to edit ~/.steam/steam/steamapps/compatdata/21980/pfx/drive_c/users/steamuser/My Documents/Call of Juarez - Bound in Blood/Out/Settings/Video.scr and hardcode your resolution there, ie: Resolution(1920,1080).
Once it boots, press enter on the black screen, after dismissing the serial key disclaimer (shift+tab), and the welcome screen will appear. It is Golden from there. It works better than in windows10 (plagued with compatibility issues)
There is a black screen if you do not modify the resolution of the game before you start (like someone wrote it here) but after this runs perfectly!!!! Great game!
title: Call of Juarez®: Bound in Blood
